meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny - Ah, yes! The most excellent Horizon Chase 2 is here to bring some much-needed speed and excitement into our lives. As a self-proclaimed gaming aficionado (aka a couch potato with a controller), I'm thrilled to dive into this fantastic arcade racing game.

Before we get started, let's take a quick peek at what the "so-called" critics have to say. *wink* Oh boy, it looks like they're all in agreement that this game is a real treat! Gaming Nexus says it's got good track design and speed, but it's missing something (I think they meant it needs me). Push Square thinks it's fun while it lasts, but won't hold your attention for long. PlayStation Universe gives it two thumbs up, calling it the "definitive arcade racing experience". GameSpew says it's bigger and better than its predecessor, with sensational speed and multiplayer features. Impulsegamer calls it a template for what a sequel should be. And IGN Spain says it's classic arcade goodness in a nutshell (or a gas tank, if you will). PlayStation Country rounds out the bunch, saying it injects high-speed fun directly into your veins (which is basically their way of saying "it's super fun").

Now that we've got the formalities out of the way, let's talk about what really matters - the gameplay! Horizon Chase 2 is an absolute blast to play. The tracks are designed to keep you on your toes, with tight turns and plenty of opportunities for speed boosts (AKA the thrill of racing). And did I mention the graphics? Wowzers! It looks like a freshly waxed sports car, shining bright in the sunlight.

Of course, no game is perfect, but Horizon Chase 2 does an amazing job of capturing that classic arcade feel. Whether you're playing solo or with friends online, this game has something for everyone. So grab your favorite snack (I recommend Doritos), get comfortable on the couch, and get ready to hit the gas!

That's all from me, folks! Hippo Penny signing off - See you in the next review!
